ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors acknowledge Exentiae s.r.l. (Catania, Italy) for kindly providing us Rosmarinus officinalis L., Lavandula x intermedia “Sumian” and Origanum vulgare subsp. hirtum and AVG s.r.l. (Bollate, Milan; Italy) for gifting 1,2-Dimyristoyl-sn-glicero-3-phoshocholine (DMPC). We also acknowledge FCT—Portuguese Foundation for Science and Technology, under the project UID/AGR/04033/2019 and INTERACT-project–NORTE-01-0145-FEDER-000017, in its research line entitled ISAC, co-financed by ERDF through NORTE2020.
